title: Dear Killian
description: A love that defies time and distance.  Dear Killian, Those two words start something I wasn't intending - something I wasn't looking for.  Dear Jersey, When every battlefield leaves me feeling alone, only letters from her give me peace.  **Each book in the Love Letters series is short sweet and to the point. Has new couples for each short story. Complete stand alone. If you're looking for depth, this series isn't it, this is about a quick fast love.
author: K.L. Donn
